subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The double amputee Oscar Pistorius ran inside the 400-meter qualifying mark for the London Olympics for a second time, leaving him one race from making history at this year’s Games.
snippet: The double amputee Oscar Pistorius ran inside the 400-meter qualifying mark for the London Olympics for a second time, leaving him one race from making history at this year’s Games.
